conversation.message: Thank you for reaching out! Our philosophy centers on inquiry-based learning. We foster creative problem-solving primarily through our 'Discovery Workshop' periods. We emphasize the process of experimentation, failure, and collaboration over finding a single 'right' answer. Our educators act as facilitators, guiding children to articulate their hypotheses and reflect on their results, thereby strengthening their critical and creative thinking skills simultaneously. We believe this approach prepares them exceptionally well for future academic challenges. Do you have any further questions about how these workshops are integrated into the daily schedule?
